abstract: Editors' Note on story regarding Hillary Rodham Clinton's use of personal email account as secretary of state and federal inquiry into whether classified information was sent using this account.
lead_paragraph: Times coverage of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s use of an email account involved corrections and changes that may have left readers with a confused picture.
snippet: Times coverage of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s use of an email account involved corrections and changes that may have left readers with a confused picture.
